metadata.title: Sustainability Maturity Assessment Benchmark
metadata.description: Comprehensive benchmark for assessing organizational sustainability maturity across 10 dimensions

1.name: Resist
1.description: Minimal sustainability awareness, reactive approach driven by compliance only

2.name: Comply
2.description: Basic compliance with regulations, sustainability seen as risk management

3.name: Optimize
3.description: Proactive sustainability integration, focus on operational improvements

4.name: Reinvent
4.description: Sustainability embedded in strategy, driving innovation and value creation

5.name: Lead
5.description: Industry leadership, shaping market standards and cross-industry collaboration

dimensions.name: Sustainability Leadership
dimensions.description: Leadership commitment, strategy development, and cultural integration

elements.name: Leadership
elements.question: Sustainability is a priority for my Leadership committee

elements.name: Strategy
elements.question: Our organization has a strategy on Sustainability

elements.name: Accountability & Culture
elements.question: Leadership our accountability on Sustainability

dimensions.name: Organization
dimensions.description: Organizational structure and governance for sustainability

elements.name: Structure
elements.question: We have an organization chart on Sustainability

elements.name: Governance
elements.question: We have policies on Sustainability in our organization

dimensions.name: Sustainability Risk Management
dimensions.description: Risk framework, performance management, and compliance processes

elements.name: Risk Framework
elements.question: Our organization has a Sustainability Risk Framework

elements.name: Performance Management
elements.question: We produce an audited sustainability report which captures our carbon emission, water usage, waste pollution, energy efficiency

elements.name: Compliance Processes
elements.question: We have a compliance process in our organization

dimensions.name: Data & Systems
dimensions.description: Data collection, insights generation, and technology application

elements.name: Access to data
elements.question: We collect Sustainability information such as Power usage, waste generated, water usage

elements.name: Actionable Insights
elements.question: We use our Sustainability Data to design new products or new processes

elements.name: Technology Application
elements.question: We use software applications like excel to track our organization's Sustainability measurements

elements.name: Skills Requirement
elements.question: We are aware of Singapore Green Plan 2030 Key Targets

elements.name: Training & Development
elements.question: Our Workforce has been given training in Sustainability practices like decarbonisation, circular economy, sustainability reporting, carbon management and waste management

dimensions.name: Direct Asset Management
dimensions.description: Asset planning, creation, and management with sustainability focus

elements.name: Asset Planning
elements.question: Our Organization owned non-movable assets are purchased or designed with sustainability in mind

elements.name: Asset Creation
elements.question: Our organization has a digital strategy to do our business and we are a paperless organization

elements.name: Asset Management
elements.question: We measure carbon footprint of our organization owned assets

dimensions.name: Product Management
dimensions.description: Sustainable product design, manufacturing, marketing, and circularity

elements.name: Design
elements.question: Our organization designs products and services which are sustainable

elements.name: Manufacture
elements.question: We build our products keeping sustainability criteria

elements.name: Sales & marketing
elements.question: Our marketing team highlight Sustainability features of our product

elements.name: Circularity
elements.question: We practice circular economy for our products

dimensions.name: Vendor Management
dimensions.description: Supplier evaluation, raw materials sourcing, and accreditation

elements.name: Supplier Base
elements.question: We collect audited Sustainability reports from our suppliers

elements.name: Raw Materials
elements.question: We source raw materials based on their sustainability characteristics and traceability

elements.name: Supplier Accreditation
elements.question: We ensure our Supplier organization has the relevant sustainability accreditation like environmental management system (ISO 14001)

dimensions.name: Metrics & Reporting
dimensions.description: Risk management, ESG reporting, and regulatory understanding

elements.name: Risk Management
elements.question: We are aware of the penalties by National Environment Agency for unsustainable practices like Green House Gas emissions

elements.name: ESG Management
elements.question: We produce an ESG Report

elements.name: Regulatory Management/ Understanding
elements.question: We work with key stakeholders such as industry, regulations, customers etc to shape the regulations in our industry

dimensions.name: Managing Change
dimensions.description: Market activation, new business models, and responsive operations

elements.name: Market Activation
elements.question: We work with Partners and our competition to drive cross Industry Sustainability change

elements.name: New Business Models
elements.question: We have built our own sustainable operating model like a checklist list to ensure sustainable practices

elements.name: Responsive Operations
elements.question: We have Sustainability KPIs

strongestDimensions.insight: Most companies are aware of regulatory penalties
Leadership commitment is emerging but inconsistent
Basic data collection infrastructure in place

recommendedFocusAreas: Implement circular economy principles in product design
Create actionable insights from sustainability data
